GlobalVariables.StudyDescription: This file contains the metadata, events, and data for REDCap project "EpiReg_minimal_dataset".

redcap:Surveys.title: EpiReg_minimal_dataset
redcap:Surveys.acknowledgement:
Danke für Ihre Teilnahme an der Umfrage.

Wir wünschen Ihnen einen schönen Tag!
redcap:Surveys.response_limit_custom_text: Danke für Ihr Interesse, jedoch wurde die Umfrage geschlossen, da genügend Antworten vorliegen.

ItemGroupDef.Name: Optional dataset

ErrorMessage.TranslatedText: The value you provided is outside the suggested range (1850 - 9999). This value is admissible, but you may wish to double check it.
The value you provided is outside the suggested range (1850 - 9999). This value is admissible, but you may wish to double check it.

ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: Multiple answers possible, please specify below

ItemDef.Name: date_mra_er
ItemDef.redcap:BranchingLogic: [type_gen_perf_er(1)] = '1' or [type_gen_perf_er(2)] = '1' or [type_gen_perf_er(3)] = '1' or [type_gen_perf_er(4)] = '1' or [type_gen_perf_er(5)] = '1' or [type_gen_perf_er(6)] = '1' or [type_gen_perf_er(7)] = '1'

ItemDef.Name: evid_var_er
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: In case of compound heterozygous variants, please enter variants separately!

ItemDef.Name: opt_data_yn_er
ItemDef.redcap:SectionHeader: Optional dataset
